TextString.Name: KitchenBigDescription
TextString.String: Vous aurez peut-être besoin de plusieurs outils de cuisine pour préparer les recettes de votre menu.

TextString.Name: KitchenSmallDescription
TextString.String: Les petits ustensiles de cuisine offrent des bonus mineurs à votre restaurant.

TextString.Name: TablesDescription
TextString.String: Les clients ont besoin d'une table pour manger dans votre restaurant.

TextString.Name: FloorDecorationDescription
TextString.String: Les décorations augmenteront votre note d'ambiance.

TextString.Name: RoomDecorationDescription
TextString.String: Les décorations augmenteront votre note d'ambiance.

TextString.Name: WallDecorationDescription
TextString.String: Les décorations augmenteront votre note d'ambiance.

TextString.Name: PaintingsDescription
TextString.String: Les décorations augmenteront votre note d'ambiance.

TextString.Name: OvenTypeDescription
TextString.String: Cette recette nécessite un four pour être cuisinée

TextString.Name: FryerTypeDescription
TextString.String: Cette recette nécessite une friteuse pour être cuisinée

TextString.Name: SteamTypeDescription
TextString.String: Cette recette nécessite un cuiseur vapeur pour être cuisinée

TextString.Name: GrillTypeDescription
TextString.String: Cette recette nécessite un grill pour être cuisinée

TextString.Name: CounterTypeDescription
TextString.String: Cette recette nécessite un comptoir pour être cuisinée

TextString.Name: Oven01Description
TextString.String: Ce four de haute qualité est si grand qu'il pourrait cuire un buffle entier, ses flammes sont si puissantes que le buffle pourrait être transformé en cendres en quelques heures. Category: Oven Cooking Slots: {WORKING_SLOTS} Maintenance Cost: {MAINTENANCE_COST}

TextString.Name: Oven02Description
TextString.String: Ni coûteux ni bon marché, ce four est le parfait compromis entre qualité et coût. Category: Oven Cooking Slots: {WORKING_SLOTS} Maintenance Cost: {MAINTENANCE_COST}

TextString.Name: Cooker01Description
TextString.String: While this cooker barely emits any form of heat, you can bring it home for a ridicolously cheap price. Category: Cooker Cooking Slots: {WORKING_SLOTS} Maintenance Cost: {MAINTENANCE_COST}

TextString.Name: Cooker02Description
TextString.String: If you ever wondered what cooker your grandmother would buy, then you now have the answer. Category: Cooker Cooking Slots: {WORKING_SLOTS} Maintenance Cost: {MAINTENANCE_COST}

TextString.Name: Cooker03Description
TextString.String: Why should a cooking professional settle for an ugly kitchen? Modern Taste provides you the aesthetically pleasing workplace you always dreamed of! Category: Cooker Cooking Slots: {WORKING_SLOTS} Maintenance Cost: {MAINTENANCE_COST}

TextString.Name: Cooker04Description
TextString.String: With this immense cooker you will be able to cook food for a whole army without ever suffering for the lack of space. Category: Cooker Cooking Slots: {WORKING_SLOTS} Maintenance Cost: {MAINTENANCE_COST}

TextString.Name: Cooker05Description
TextString.String: Still thinking your grandma knows nothing about the modern world? Well, think again! The Cooker Grandma's Choice 2100 was made by grandmas for grandmas, without forgetting about top notch technology! Category: Cooker Cooking Slots: {WORKING_SLOTS} Maintenance Cost: {MAINTENANCE_COST}

TextString.Name: Fridge01Description
Fridge02Description
Fridge03Description
Counter01Description
TextString.String: The simplest counter on the market: not particularly pleasing for the eye, but it works. Category: Counter Preparation Areas: One

TextString.Name: Counter02Description
TextString.String: This counter was designed by grandmas, for grandmas. Category: Counter Preparation Areas: Two

TextString.Name: Counter03Description
TextString.String: This counter was created using a complex neural AI to simulate the thought patterns of future grandmas. Category: Counter Preparation Areas: Two

TextString.Name: Fryer01Description
TextString.String: CryspyChoice offers you a decade long experience in assembling the nicest fryers on the market! Category: Fryer Cooking Slots: {WORKING_SLOTS} Maintenance Cost: {MAINTENANCE_COST}

TextString.Name: Fryer02Description
TextString.String: The best Fryer in the world, brought to you by CrispyChoice! Category: Fryer Cooking Slots: {WORKING_SLOTS} Maintenance Cost: {MAINTENANCE_COST}

TextString.Name: Fryer03Description
TextString.String: Why pay a lot for a fryer when the Cheap Brothers are here with this awesome model? Category: Fryer Cooking Slots: {WORKING_SLOTS} Maintenance Cost: {MAINTENANCE_COST}

TextString.Name: Fryer04Description
TextString.String: Why have ugly edges in your kitchen? The only edge you need is on your knife, your appliances should be soothing for the eyes! Category: Fryer Cooking Slots: {WORKING_SLOTS} Maintenance Cost: {MAINTENANCE_COST}

TextString.Name: Fryer05Description
TextString.String: Have you ever stared at your crappy, small kitchen in complete disappointment because you couldn't fry the entire Polish production of potatoes? Now you can, with the massive Fryer OilTsunami! Category: Fryer Cooking Slots: {WORKING_SLOTS} Maintenance Cost: {MAINTENANCE_COST}

TextString.Name: Mixer01Description
Mixer02Description
Mixer03Description
Blender01Description
Blender02Description
Blender03Description
Coffeemachine01Description
Microwave01Description
Dishwasher01Description
Dishwasher02Description
Dishwasher03Description
Grill01Description
TextString.String: Depuis 1900, Oncle Bob produit le même gril ennuyeux. Mais vous ne pouvez pas ignorer cent ans d'histoire! Category: Grill Cooking Slots: {WORKING_SLOTS} Maintenance Cost: {MAINTENANCE_COST}

TextString.Name: TestGrill02Description
TextString.String: Initialement destiné à fournir un gril de plusieurs siècles aux fanatiques de l'apocalypse pendant la guerre froide, ce gril revient aujourd'hui sur le marché Category: Grill Cooking Slots: {WORKING_SLOTS} Maintenance Cost: {MAINTENANCE_COST}

TextString.Name: TestGrill03Description
TextString.String: Croyez-vous au changement climatique ? Nous ne croyons pas non plus à Hellflame, alors qui se soucie de savoir si cette beauté a le même rendement thermique qu'une ville entière ? Category: Grill Cooking Slots: {WORKING_SLOTS} Maintenance Cost: {MAINTENANCE_COST}

TextString.Name: TestGrill04Description
TextString.String: Avec son design unique, le TY-50 est là pour vous offrir une expérience de grillade de premier choix agrémentée d'un délicieux arôme fumé ! Category: Grill Cooking Slots: {WORKING_SLOTS} Maintenance Cost: {MAINTENANCE_COST}

TextString.Name: TestGrill05Description
TextString.String: La technologie fait tout, même dans la cuisine ! Faites-vous une faveur et achetez le meilleur grill jamais créé, vos clients remarqueront la différence ! Category: Grill Cooking Slots: {WORKING_SLOTS} Maintenance Cost: {MAINTENANCE_COST}

TextString.Name: Steam01Description
TextString.String: Le CloudMaker devait à l'origine être une arme capable de contrôler le temps, mais lorsqu'ils ont réalisé que les nuages ne sont pas si effrayants que ça, ils ont dû improviser. Category: Steamer Cooking Slots: {WORKING_SLOTS} Maintenance Cost: {MAINTENANCE_COST}

TextString.Name: Steam02Description
TextString.String: Certains diront que les aliments cuits à la vapeur n'ont pas de goût, mais la saveur chimique unique que procure cette merveille leur fermera la bouche. Category: Steamer Cooking Slots: {WORKING_SLOTS} Maintenance Cost: {MAINTENANCE_COST}

TextString.Name: Steam03Description
TextString.String: La première étape d'une alimentation saine consiste à éliminer toute sorte de saveur de ce que vous mangez, et ce merveilleux Steamer est là pour vous. Category: Steamer Cooking Slots: {WORKING_SLOTS} Maintenance Cost: {MAINTENANCE_COST}

TextString.Name: Steam04Description
TextString.String: Profitez d'un soin de sauna de niveau SPA pour vos plats. Category: Steamer Cooking Slots: {WORKING_SLOTS} Maintenance Cost: {MAINTENANCE_COST}

TextString.Name: Steam05Description
TextString.String: D'après la publicité, on y met de vrais geysers, mais attention à l'utilisation de ce cuiseur vapeur ! Category: Steamer Cooking Slots: {WORKING_SLOTS} Maintenance Cost: {MAINTENANCE_COST}

TextString.Name: Table01_4seatsDescription
TextString.String: Une table en bois simple mais élégante, avec des échardes mortelles.

TextString.Name: Table02_4seatsDescription
TextString.String: Rien de tel que des tables modernes pour dire "Mon restaurant est cool et branché"

TextString.Name: Table03_4seatsDescription
TextString.String: Selon les rumeurs, cette table est basée sur un ancien dessin extraterrestre trouvé dans un donjon secret sous les Pyramides.

TextString.Name: Table01_2seatsDescription
TextString.String: Une table en bois simple mais élégante, avec des échardes mortelles

TextString.Name: Table02_2seatsDescription
TextString.String: Rien de tel que des tables modernes pour dire "Mon restaurant est cool et branché"

TextString.Name: Table03_2seatsDescription
TextString.String: Selon les rumeurs, cette table est basée sur un ancien dessin extraterrestre trouvé dans un donjon secret sous les Pyramides

TextString.Name: Table04_2seatsDescription
TextString.String: Tout droit sorti des années 70, la table que l'on n'aimait pas quand on était plus jeune mais que l'on apprécie tout à coup en vieillissant !

TextString.Name: Table04_4seatsDescription
TextString.String: Tout droit sorti des années 70, la table que l'on n'aimait pas quand on était plus jeune mais que l'on apprécie tout à coup en vieillissant !

TextString.Name: Table05_2seatsDescription
TextString.String: Are you a fanatic of simple design? The simple but refined shapes of this table will bring you physical pleasure!

TextString.Name: Table05_4seatsDescription
TextString.String: Are you a fanatic of simple design? The simple but refined shapes of this table will bring you physical pleasure!

TextString.Name: Table06_2seatsDescription
TextString.String: Straight from the collection of decadent European nobles, a fine and characteristic table with antiquarian value

TextString.Name: Table06_4seatsDescription
TextString.String: Straight from the collection of decadent European nobles, a fine and characteristic table with antiquarian value

TextString.Name: Table07_2seatsCheapDescription
TextString.String: Why spend money on wooden tables when plastic is cheap and eternal?

TextString.Name: Table07_4seatsCheapDescription
TextString.String: Why spend money on wooden tables when plastic is cheap and eternal?

TextString.Name: Table07_2seatsLuxDescription
TextString.String: Silk cloth, comfortable chairs, infinite prestige. This is the table you need for your restaurant.

TextString.Name: Table07_4seatsLuxDescription
TextString.String: Silk cloth, comfortable chairs, infinite prestige. This is the table you need for your restaurant.

TextString.Name: Table07_2seatsMidDescription
TextString.String: Wooden table, wooden seats, a cloth: everything you need to give a touch of beauty to your place.

TextString.Name: Table07_4seatsMidDescription
TextString.String: Wooden table, wooden seats, a cloth: everything you need to give a touch of beauty to your place.

TextString.Name: Table07_2seatsPoorDescription
TextString.String: Can't afford real wood? You can always buy tables made from sawdust glued together!

TextString.Name: Table07_4seatsPoorDescription
TextString.String: Can't afford real wood? You can always buy tables made from sawdust glued together!

TextString.Name: Painting00_Scomposto_City_Description
TextString.String:
A nice collection of city landscapes, including some of the most iconical landscapes but arbitrarily ignoring others.
{PERKS}

TextString.Name: Painting00_Scomposto_FoodDescription
TextString.String:
With this awesome collection, you'll be able to turn your restaurant (a food-themed place) into a food-themed restaurant (a food-themed food-themed place? What?)
{PERKS}

TextString.Name: Painting00_Scomposto_NatureBlueDescription
TextString.String:
A collection of blue photos about nature. You can bet half of them are skies and the other half water.
{PERKS}

TextString.Name: Painting00_Scomposto_NatureGreenDescription
TextString.String:
A collection of green photos about nature. Basically a lot of trees.
{PERKS}

TextString.Name: Painting00_Scomposto_NatureYellowDescription
TextString.String:
A collection of yellow photos about nature.
{PERKS}

TextString.Name: Chalkboard_BigDescription
TextString.String:
There's nothing better than a massive chalkboard to write the day's menu and draw ambiguous figures.
{PERKS}

TextString.Name: Chalkboard_SmallDescription
TextString.String:
This chalkboard is perfect to write the daily offer and to tactically adjust the prices right before the customers ask for the bill.
{PERKS}

TextString.Name: Clock_ClassicDescription
TextString.String:
This cheap clock will remind to all customers what time is it, so they can pay and get out without indulging into silly chats.
{PERKS}

TextString.Name: Clock_CutleryDescription
TextString.String:
Cutlery on a restaurant clock. Truly brilliant. So funny.
{PERKS}

TextString.Name: Clock_VintageDescription
TextString.String:
What once was the only ugly choice on the market in terms of clocks, is now a wonderful vintage decoration.
{PERKS}

TextString.Name: Carpet_SquareDescription
TextString.String:
Placing carpets in a restaurant means to permanently turn them into colonies of bacteria living on ancient food remains.
{PERKS}

TextString.Name: Carpet_Modern1Description
TextString.String:
Placing carpets in a restaurant means to permanently turn them into colonies of bacteria living on ancient food remains.
{PERKS}

TextString.String:

TextString.Name: Carpet_Persian4Description
TextString.String:
Placing carpets in a restaurant means to permanently turn them into colonies of bacteria living on ancient food remains.
{PERKS}

TextString.Name: Mensola_viniDescription
TextString.String:
Too bad the bottles are fake, but it's still a nice decoration for your hall!
{PERKS}

TextString.Name: Carpet_CircleDescription
TextString.String:
Placing carpets in a restaurant means to permanently turn them into colonies of bacteria living on ancient food remains.
{PERKS}

TextString.Name: Carpet_RectangularDescription
TextString.String:
Placing carpets in a restaurant means to permanently turn them into colonies of bacteria living on ancient food remains.
{PERKS}

TextString.Name: Credenza_NoceDescription
TextString.String:
100% walnut wood, not even a tornado could destroy it.
{PERKS}

TextString.Name: Credenza_bassaDescription
TextString.String:
100% walnut wood, not even a tornado could destroy it.
{PERKS}

TextString.Name: Credenza_vetroDescription
TextString.String:
100% walnut wood, not even a tornado could destroy it.
{PERKS}

TextString.Name: Credenza_bassa_vetroDescription
TextString.String:
100% walnut wood, not even a tornado could destroy it.
{PERKS}

TextString.Name: Vase_BambooDescription
TextString.String:
This Bamboo decorative vase is made by pandas that got tired of sleeping in their zoo ans started their own company.
{PERKS}

TextString.Name: Vase_CeramicaDescription
TextString.String:
They told you this is an original Ping Dynasty vase, but you googled that and there's no Ping Dynasty.
{PERKS}

TextString.Name: Vase_PlantDescription
TextString.String:
This 100% plastic plant decorates the hall without letting your carelessness kill it.
{PERKS}

TextString.Name: Vase_Plant2Description
TextString.String:
This 100% plastic plant decorates the hall without letting your carelessness kill it.
{PERKS}

TextString.Name: BarrelDescription
TextString.String:
It's a wooden barrel that was once a proud object used for doing stuff, but now is nothing more than a decoration.
{PERKS}

TextString.Name: Barrel_wBottlesDescription
TextString.String:
A wooden barrel with a few empty wine bottles on it. Just why?
{PERKS}

TextString.Name: Barrel_wTableDescription
TextString.String:
Purely decorative, this barrel placed on a solid table can lure alcoholic customers.
{PERKS}

TextString.Name: Mensole_EsagonaliDescription
TextString.String:
Let you customers be astonished by your geometrical taste in modern furnishing design!
{PERKS}

TextString.Name: MirrorDescription
TextString.String:
While you may expect a mirror to actually reflect stuff, the developers of this game were worried it could hinder the game's performances. How thoughtful of them!
{PERKS}

TextString.Name: Mirror02Description
TextString.String:
While you may expect a mirror to actually reflect stuff, the developers of this game were worried it could hinder the game's performances. How thoughtful of them!
{PERKS}

TextString.Name: Mirror03Description
TextString.String:
While you may expect a mirror to actually reflect stuff, the developers of this game were worried it could hinder the game's performances. How thoughtful of them!
{PERKS}

TextString.Name: Mirror04Description
TextString.String:
While you may expect a mirror to actually reflect stuff, the developers of this game were worried it could hinder the game's performances. How thoughtful of them!
{PERKS}

TextString.Name: MensolibreriaDescription
TextString.String:
Let your customers judge your reading tastes with an unmotivated sense of superiority with this practical bookshelf.
{PERKS}

TextString.Name: Pianta_DepressaDescription
TextString.String:
This plant looks a little sad, but that's fine. We still love and accept you, sad plant.
{PERKS}

TextString.Name: Tris_MensoleName
TextString.String:
Not one, not two, but three shelves to furnish your place!
{PERKS}

TextString.Name: Tris_Piatti_Description
TextString.String:
Three is always the right answer *wink wink*
{PERKS}

TextString.Name: Cart_WheelDescription
TextString.String:
Once used for a cart, now a fine decoration piece used by people who never saw a cart.
{PERKS}

TextString.Name: Counter04Description
TextString.String: Why spend your whole day complaining about your job when you can have fun with it? Category: Counter Preparation Areas: Two

TextString.Name: Counter05Description
TextString.String: The counter every Chef Master should use! Category: Counter Preparation Areas: Two

TextString.Name: Oven03Description
TextString.String: The manual says this oven will cook everything faster. Even if that's not possible according to the laws of physics. Category: Oven Cooking Slots: {WORKING_SLOTS} Maintenance Cost: {MAINTENANCE_COST}

TextString.Name: Oven04Description
TextString.String: Have you ever felt you can't control the cooking process? Or your oven? Or your life? Then the Over SuperControl is here for you! Category: Oven Cooking Slots: {WORKING_SLOTS} Maintenance Cost: {MAINTENANCE_COST}

TextString.Name: Oven05Description
TextString.String: Why pay for both lighting and ovens when a single tool can do both things? Category: Oven Cooking Slots: {WORKING_SLOTS} Maintenance Cost: {MAINTENANCE_COST}

TextString.Name: Urn01Description
TextString.String:
You get annoyed with empty spots? Just place a vase on them to fill the space!
{PERKS}

TextString.Name: Urn02Description
TextString.String:
You get annoyed with empty spots? Just place a vase on them to fill the space!
{PERKS}

TextString.Name: SmallTable01Description
TextString.String:
A small table which only purpose is to please the eye, and occasionaly used to support ashtrays.
{PERKS}

TextString.Name: Piano01Description
TextString.String:
A majestic instrument, which some of your customers may be tempted to play to annoy everyone else in the room. After that, they'll just say that they're "rusty". Yeah, sure.
{PERKS}

TextString.Name: Piano02Description
TextString.String:
A majestic instrument, which some of your customers may be tempted to play to annoy everyone else in the room. After that, they'll just say that they're "rusty". Yeah, sure.
{PERKS}

TextString.Name: Credenza_CupboardLuxDescription
TextString.String:
So elegant, so beautiful, a worthy piece of furniture.
{PERKS}

TextString.Name: Credenza_CupboardRusticDescription
TextString.String:
You don't need fancy cupboards to display a few plates and glasses.
{PERKS}

TextString.Name: Credenza_CupboardLux2Description
TextString.String:
This imposing cupboard alone could fit three people in it. Toilets are not included.
{PERKS}

TextString.Name: Credenza_CupboardSlimDescription
TextString.String:
Are you worried that there is not enough space in your restaurant? This incredibly slim cupboard is what you need to liven the ambience a little.
{PERKS}

TextString.Name: Wine_FridgeDescription
TextString.String:
A modern and efficient fridge to keep your wine bottles at the ideal serving temperature.
{PERKS}

TextString.Name: WineShelves_LuxuryDescription
TextString.String:
A majestic piece of furniture capable of holding two hundreds bottles. A secure lock is included.
{PERKS}

TextString.Name: WineShelves_ModernDescription
TextString.String:
If you need some space to store your high quality wine bottles, then you really need this furniture piece. Forget about boxes and storage rooms!
{PERKS}

TextString.Name: Wine_ArcsDescription
TextString.String:
When architecture meets alcoholism true wonders of modern design are born. And this piece of furniture is one of them!
{PERKS}

TextString.Name: PlateHolderDescription
TextString.String:
What's more original than having plates hanged on your wall? Nothing! So feel free to buy this awesome decoration to blow the mind of your customers!
{PERKS}
